class.name: org.genedb.db.hibernate3gen.CvTermDbXRef
class.comment: In addition to the primary identifier (cvterm.dbxref_id) a cvterm can have zero or more secondary identifiers, which may be in external databases

column.name: is_for_definition
column.comment: A cvterm.definition should be supported by one or more references. If this column is true, the dbxref is not for a term in an external db - it is a dbxref for provenance information for the definition
